title: Jonathan Kodjia - Wikipedia
snippet: Jonathan Adjo Kodjia (born 22 October 1989) is a professional footballer who plays as a forward for Championnat National club Versailles. Born in France, he represents the Ivory Coast national team. Kodjia started his career at Reims and gained experience in the Championnat National (French ...

title: Jonathan Kodjia
snippet: On 1 July 2022, Jonathan Kodjia joined Umm Salal on a free transfer, signing a one-year contract with the Qatar Stars League club following the expiration of his deal at Al-Gharafa.[1] This move marked his continued presence in Qatari football, ...

title: Jonathan Kodjia - Ivory Coast | Player Profile | Sky Sports Football
snippet: Aston Villa have signed striker Jonathan Kodjia from Bristol City for £15m, a Championship record fee.

title: Jonathan Kodjia: Bristol City forward has £10m-plus price tag, says owner Steve Lansdown - BBC Sport
snippet: Ivory Coast international Jonathan Kodjia will not be sold for less than £10m, says Bristol City owner Steve Lansdown.
